title: Modern Serif Font, maybe Slab / Clarendon model
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172245im_/http:/typophile.com/files/10375859_761144140596295_1137667695_n_4913.jpg)

I like this font and can't find it. This photo is made of a book (hard cover). Sadly the publisher didn't answer my question.

Font: 

 TheAntiquaB 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172245/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [10375859\_761144140596295\_1137667695\_n.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172245/http:/typophile.com/files/10375859_761144140596295_1137667695_n.jpg) | 90.15 KB |
author: michsch

comments.content: It looks like a Semibold/Semilight combination of **[TheAntiquaB](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172245/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/typeshow/?ts-font=TheAntiquaB&ts-style=Plain)** by Luc[as] de Groot [Lucas Fonts, 2000]
Thank you! It definitely looks like TheAntiquaB. How fast was that? ;-)
